title: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height does not update immediately.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the application UI.
2. Modify the font size of a label.
3. Observe that the label height does not change in response to the font modification.
OB: The label height does not change when the font size of the label is modified in the application UI.
EB: The label height should update immediately when the font size of the label is modified in the application UI.
SR: Fix the issue so that the label height updates immediately when the font size of the label is modified in the application UI.
